item.title: 波兰出售 30 亿欧元债券后将专注于 2025 年的资金需求
item.description: 波兰财政部债务主管表示，在 30 亿欧元（33 亿美元）债券销售 "基本完成 "其 2024 年借贷计划后，波兰政府的目标是专注于明年的融资需求。【原文：Poland’s government aims to focus on next year’s financing needs after a €3 billion ($3.3 billion) bond sale “practically completed” its borrowing plan for 2024, according to the Finance Ministry’s debt chief.】

item.title: 意大利将比特币资本利得税从 26% 提高到 42
item.description: 意大利计划将比特币的资本利得税从 26% 提高到 42%，这是在削减财政赤字的同时为昂贵的竞选承诺提供资金的努力之一。【原文：Italy plans to raise the capital gains tax on Bitcoin to 42% from 26%, part of efforts to finance expensive election promises while cutting the fiscal deficit.】

item.title: ASML 意外财报预示部分芯片制造商前途未卜
item.description: ASML 的意外业绩对整个芯片行业都有影响。但首先...【原文：ASML’s surprise results have implications for the overall chip industry. But first...】

item.title: 米莱为何无法在短期内解除阿根廷的货币管制
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在接任阿根廷总统之前，曾有过远大的目标。其中之一就是摆脱国家的货币管制。但令企业家、高管和普通阿根廷人失望的是，这并不像这位政治家设想的那么容易。【原文：Javier Milei had big, ambitious goals before he took over as Argentina’s president. One of them: getting rid of the country’s currency controls. But, to the dismay of entrepreneurs, executives and ordinary Argentines alike, that isn’t as easy as the politician envisaged.】

item.title: 神经链接公司的顶级外科医生是马斯克的制衡者
item.description:
虽然这位备受争议的首席执行官认为未来将出现人脑与机器的融合，但实际上马修-麦克杜格尔（Matthew MacDougall）可能是您最希望在大脑中植入芯片的人。【原文：

While the controversial CEO sees a future merging of human minds with machine, Matthew MacDougall may actually be the man you’d want putting a chip in your brain.

】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率攀升至 6.52%，创 8 月初以来新高
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第二周大幅上升，达到 8 月初以来的最高水平，同时导致购房和再融资活动急剧下降。【原文：US mortgage rates rose sharply for a second straight week, reaching the highest level since early August while prompting steep declines in both home-purchase and refinance activity.】

item.title: 汽车制造商的困境拖累全球信贷市场回报率
item.description: 汽车制造商的困境正成为全球企业债券市场最大的痛点之一，随着汽车销售停滞和竞争加剧，投资者纷纷退出该行业的债务。【原文：Carmakers’ woes are turning into one of the global corporate bond market’s biggest pain points, with investors bailing out of the sector’s debt as vehicle sales stall and competition rises.】

item.title: ASML 跌跌不休引发芯片业前景质疑
item.description: 自 ASML Holding NV 报告其芯片制造设备订单疲软以来，该公司的市值已损失超过 600 亿欧元（约合 653 亿美元），迫使投资者重新评估该行业的健康状况。【原文：ASML Holding NV has lost more than €60 billion ($65.3 billion) in market value since it reported weak orders for its chipmaking machines, forcing investors to reevaluate the health of the industry.】

item.title: 交易员重拾对特朗普赢得美国大选的赌注
item.description: 距离美国总统大选还有不到三周的时间，以下是主要资产的大选交易情况：【原文：With the US presidential race less than three weeks away, here's how election trades are shaping up in key assets:】

item.title: 巴克莱银行认为英国股市将面临风险
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的策略师表示，随着利率下降刺激对股票市场风险较高部分的投资，英国上市股票的防御性吸引力不太可能持续下去。【原文：The defensive attraction of UK-listed stocks is unlikely to endure, as falling interest rates spur investment in riskier parts of the equity market, strategists at Barclays Plc said.】

item.title: 纳米比亚称正按计划偿还部分 7.5 亿美元债券
item.description: 纳米比亚央行行长表示，纳米比亚偿还三分之二明年到期的 7.5 亿美元欧元债券的计划进展顺利。【原文：Namibia’s plans to retire two-thirds of its $750 million eurobond due next year are progressing well, its central bank governor said.】

item.title: 新加坡娱乐公司 Neon 据称将选择银行进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，沉浸式娱乐集团 Neon 已为其可能在新加坡进行的首次公开募股挑选了财务顾问。【原文：Immersive entertainment group Neon has picked financial advisers for its potential initial public offering in Singapore, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 霸菱将推出欧洲首批私人信贷 CLO 之一
item.description: 霸菱有限责任公司（Barings LLC）准备在欧洲启动一项中型市场抵押贷款义务，从而启动一项吸引该地区多家领先私人信贷公司的新兴战略。【原文：Barings LLC is poised to start a middle-market collateralized loan obligation in Europe, kickstarting a nascent strategy that appeals to a number of leading private credit firms in the region.】

item.title: 关注美国大选和美联储利率，黄金逼近新纪录
item.description: 随着投资者将注意力转向即将到来的美国大选，黄金涨至历史新高。【原文：Gold rallied toward a fresh record high as investors turned their attention to the upcoming US election, with polls forecasting a razor-thin contest with less than three weeks to go.】

item.title: 印度称信任缺失正在损害与邻国的关系
item.description: 印度外交部长苏布拉哈曼亚姆-杰尚卡尔（Subrahmanyam Jaishankar）表示，上海合作组织成员国之间缺乏信任正在破坏经济和贸易关系。【原文：Lack of trust among member nations of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization is damaging economic and trade ties, according to India’s External Affairs Minister Subrahmanyam Jaishankar.】

item.title: 中国股市大起大落损害了 21 万亿美元的大牛市
item.description: 中国 2 亿散户投资者大军本应帮助市场转危为安。然而，它却成了市场疲软的根源。【原文：China’s 200 million-strong army of retail investors was supposed to help the market turn a corner. Instead, it has become a source of weakness.】

item.title: 在线博彩进军新市场受阻于反对意见
item.description: 在少数几个允许在线赌场赌博的州，在线赌场赌博已成为一门大生意，但这种增长势头可能已经结束。【原文：Online casino gambling has become a big business in the handful of states that allow it, but that growth spurt may be over.】

item.title: 捷克决策者霍卢布呼吁更积极地降低利率
item.description: 政策制定者托马斯-霍卢布（Tomas Holub）表示，捷克经济正面临一些 "轻微的反通胀 "风险，这将允许央行在今年剩余时间内采取更积极的货币宽松政策。【原文：The Czech economy is facing some “mildly anti-inflationary” risks that should allow more aggressive monetary easing by the central bank in the remainder of this year, according to policymaker Tomas Holub.】

item.title: 荷兰推进限制大学英语教学的计划
item.description: 荷兰政府正在推进一项限制大学使用英语的提案，以阻止国际学生涌入荷兰。【原文：The Dutch government is moving ahead with a proposal to curb the use of English at universities, as it seeks to stem the influx of international students in the Netherlands.】

item.title: 匈牙利希望银行 "自愿 "同意 5%的抵押贷款上限
item.description: 匈牙利内阁部长格尔格利-古利亚斯（Gergely Gulyas）表示，匈牙利正在与贷款机构进行谈判，以说服他们同意 "自愿 "设定抵押贷款利率上限，从而促进经济增长。【原文：Hungary is in talks with lenders to convince them to agree to a “voluntary” cap on mortgage rates to boost economic growth, Cabinet Minister Gergely Gulyas said.】

item.title: 印度认为加拿大存在指控政府高官的风险
item.description: 熟悉此事的印度官员说，印度政府正在考虑，如果与加拿大的外交冲突恶化，高级官员可能面临法庭指控的风险。【原文：India’s government is considering the risk that senior officials could face court charges if a diplomatic fallout with Canada worsens, Indian officials familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 泰国意外降息凸显亚洲经济增长忧虑
item.description: 东南亚最大的央行之一出人意料地降低了利率，这凸显了整个地区对经济增长的日益担忧如何超过了通胀风险。【原文：One of Southeast Asia’s largest central banks unexpectedly cut interest rates, underscoring how increasing economic growth concerns outweigh inflation risks across the region.】

item.title: 印度九月份贸易逆差缩小，进口额下降
item.description: 由于印度控制了进口支出，该国 9 月份的贸易赤字降至四个月以来的最低点。【原文：India’s trade deficit narrowed to the lowest in four-months in September as the nation reined in its import bill.】

item.title: 芯片股拖累新兴市场指数，中国面临修正区域
item.description: 周三，新兴市场股市下跌，芯片制造商阿斯麦（ASML）的疲软前景打压了市场情绪，导致股市大幅下挫。【原文：Emerging-market stocks fell on Wednesday, led by a sharp drop in chipmakers after ASML’s weak outlook dampened sentiment.】

item.title: SAP 取代 ASML 成为欧洲最有价值技术公司
item.description: ASML Holding NV 的指导性削减导致这家荷兰芯片设备制造商的股价暴跌，使其欧洲最有价值技术公司的地位被软件公司 SAP SE 取代。【原文：ASML Holding NV lost its place as Europe’s most valuable technology company to software firm SAP SE after a guidance cut sent the Dutch chip-machine maker’s shares plunging.】

item.title: 泰铢波动，比索在降息后步履维艰
item.description: 泰国央行四年多来首次降息，令投资者大吃一惊，泰铢随之波动。菲律宾中央银行（Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas）如期降息后，菲律宾比索变化不大。【原文：Thailand’s baht flip-flopped after the nation’s central bank surprised investors with its first interest rate cut in more than four years. The Philippine peso was little changed after Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas delivered an expected rate reduction.】

item.title: 高盛沙特阿拉伯首席执行官在任职十年后将离职
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s top executive in Saudi Arabia is set to leave the bank after nearly a decade running its operations in the Middle East’s biggest economy, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 香港寻求深化作为离岸人民币交易中心的角色
item.description: 香港正在寻求进一步发展其作为人民币和中国债券离岸中心的作用。【原文：Hong Kong is seeking to further develop its role as an offshore center for the yuan and Chinese bonds.】

item.title: 面对中国威胁，欧洲航空公司压力陡增
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法航荷航正在游说法国政府限制中国大陆航空公司飞往欧洲的航班数量，以保护欧洲航空公司免受不公平竞争。【原文：Air-France KLM is lobbying the French government to cap the number of flights that mainland Chinese carriers can make to Europe, according to people familiar with the matter, in a bid to protect European airlines from unfair competition.】

item.title: 印尼盾承压后印尼央行维持关键利率不变
item.description: 由于外部风险拖累印尼盾，印尼央行一如预期维持关键利率稳定，暂停了宽松周期。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank kept its key interest rate steady as expected, pausing an easing cycle as external risks drag on the rupiah currency.】
